entry.data:
RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
